lines: 1. Mbuye ali thanthwe lathu, Ndiye pothawira pathu;
Ndiyetu thanthwe lilomba, Ndi mthuzi nthawi yotentha;
Mtsogozi wa aulendo, Ndiye pothawira pathu.
2. Pa nthawi ya usikuwo, Ndiye pothawira pathu;
3. Nkana chigumula chidze, Ndiye pothawira pathu;
Mwa Mlungu tipeza bwino, Ndiye pothawira pathu.
4. Inu thanthwe lokondedwa, Ndinu pothawira pathu;
Khalani mthangati wathu, Ndinu pothawira pathu.
